permissions.header_content: Note: Disabling permissions is a permanent decision

charge_market_fee.enabledInfo: The asset creator can enable charging market trading fees for this asset.
charge_market_fee.disabledInfo: The asset creator cannot charge market trading fees for this asset.

white_list.enabledInfo: The asset creator can enable configuring white list authorities for this asset.
white_list.disabledInfo: The asset creator cannot configure white list authorities for this asset.

override_authority.about: Asset owner may transfer asset back to themselves
override_authority.enabledInfo: The asset creator can enable the ability to perform an override transfer operation on this asset.
override_authority.disabledInfo: The asset creator cannot perform override transfer operations on this asset.

transfer_restricted.about: Asset owner must approve all transfers
transfer_restricted.enabledInfo: The asset creator can enable the ability to restrict transfers of this asset.
transfer_restricted.disabledInfo: The asset creator cannot restrict transfers of this asset.

disable_confidential.enabledInfo: The asset creator can enable the ability to disable confidential operations for this asset.
disable_confidential.disabledInfo: The asset creator cannot disable confidential operations for this asset.

witness_fed_asset.enabledInfo: The asset creator can enable witnesses to publish price feeds for this asset.
witness_fed_asset.disabledInfo: The asset creator cannot enable witnesses to publish price feeds for this asset.

committee_fed_asset.about: Allow committee members to provide feeds
committee_fed_asset.enabledInfo: The asset creator can enable committee members to publish price feeds for this asset.
committee_fed_asset.disabledInfo: The asset creator cannot enable committee members to publish price feeds for this asset.

disable_force_settle.enabledInfo: The asset creator can enable the ability to disable force settling for this asset.
disable_force_settle.disabledInfo: The asset creator cannot disable force settling for this asset.

global_settle.about: Allow asset owner to force a global settling
global_settle.enabledInfo: The asset creator can enable the ability to globally settle this asset.
global_settle.disabledInfo: The asset creator cannot globally settle this asset.

lock_max_supply.enabledInfo: The asset creator cannot lock the max supply of this asset.
lock_max_supply.disabledInfo: The asset creator can lock the max supply of this asset.

disable_new_supply.enabledInfo: The asset creator cannot disable the ability to create new supply for this asset.
disable_new_supply.disabledInfo: The asset creator can disable the ability to create new supply for this asset.

disable_collateral_bidding.enabledInfo: The asset creator cannot disable collateral bidding for this asset.
disable_collateral_bidding.disabledInfo: The asset creator can disable collateral bidding for this asset.

disable_mcr_update.about: Disable owner update Minimum Collateral Ratio
disable_mcr_update.enabledInfo: The asset owner uses a price fed Minimum Collateral Ratio requirement for this asset.
disable_mcr_update.disabledInfo: The asset owner statically sets the Minimum Collateral Ratio requirement for this asset.

disable_icr_update.about: Disable owner update Initial Collateral Ratio
disable_icr_update.enabledInfo: The asset owner uses a price fed Initial Collateral Ratio requirement for this asset.
disable_icr_update.disabledInfo: The asset owner statically sets the Initial Collateral Ratio requirement for this asset.

disable_mssr_update.about: Disable owner update Maximum Short Squeeze Ratio
disable_mssr_update.enabledInfo: The asset owner uses a price fed Maximum Short Squeeze Ratio for this asset.
disable_mssr_update.disabledInfo: The asset owner statically sets the Maximum Short Squeeze Ratio for this asset.

disable_bsrm_update.about: Disable owner update Black Swan Risk Management strategy
disable_bsrm_update.enabledInfo: The asset owner uses the default Global Settlement strategy for this asset.
disable_bsrm_update.disabledInfo: The asset owner uses a custom Black Swan Risk Management strategy for this asset.

flags.header_content: Each allowed asset permission can be toggled on/off.

charge_market_fee.enabledInfo: The asset creator can configure market trading fees for this asset, including market fee reward sharing functionality.
charge_market_fee.disabledInfo: The asset creator has disabled charging market trading fees for this asset.

white_list.enabledInfo: The asset creator can configure white list authorities for this asset.
white_list.disabledInfo: The asset creator has disabled configuring white list authorities for this asset.

override_authority.about: Asset owner may transfer asset back to themselves
override_authority.enabledInfo: The asset creator can perform an override transfer operation on this asset, returning it to their balance from yours.
override_authority.disabledInfo: The asset creator has disabled performing override transfer operations on this asset.

disable_force_settle.enabledInfo: The asset creator has disabled force settling for this asset.
disable_force_settle.disabledInfo: The asset creator has enabled force settling for this asset.

transfer_restricted.about: Asset owner must approve all transfers
transfer_restricted.enabledInfo: The asset creator can restrict transfers of this asset.
transfer_restricted.disabledInfo: The asset creator has disabled restricting transfers of this asset.

disable_confidential.enabledInfo: The asset creator has disabled confidential operations for this asset.
disable_confidential.disabledInfo: The asset creator hasn't disabled confidential operations for this asset.

witness_fed_asset.enabledInfo: Witnesses can publish price feeds for this asset.
witness_fed_asset.disabledInfo: Witnesses cannot publish price feeds for this asset.

committee_fed_asset.about: Allow committee members to provide feeds
committee_fed_asset.enabledInfo: Committee members can publish price feeds for this asset.
committee_fed_asset.disabledInfo: Committee members cannot publish price feeds for this asset.

lock_max_supply.enabledInfo: The asset owner has locked the maximum supply of this asset.
lock_max_supply.disabledInfo: The asset owner hasn't locked the maximum supply of this asset.

disable_new_supply.enabledInfo: The asset owner has disabled the ability to issue new supply for this asset.
disable_new_supply.disabledInfo: The asset owner allows the issuance of additional supply for this asset.

disable_collateral_bidding.enabledInfo: The asset owner has disabled collateral bidding for this asset.
disable_collateral_bidding.disabledInfo: The asset owner has enabled collateral bidding for this asset.

asset_details.title: Asset Details
asset_details.title_content: These are the asset settings used for core DEX functionality.

symbol.header_content: The asset symbol is an unique identifier on the blockchain identifiying the asset throughout the DEX. Cheaper assets can be created by using a subasset name like NFT.TITLE

shortName.header_content: This is the short name of the asset, less important than the symbol but still am optionally shortened unique identifier. You can just re-use the symbol for this field.

preferredMarket.header_content: The preferred market trading pair is the default asset used to trade against your asset, this is an informal suggestion.

description.header_content: This is the description of the asset, it will be displayed in the DEX and can be used to provide more information about the asset.

max_supply.header_content: The maximum supply of the asset, this is the total amount of the asset that can ever be issued by the asset owner (you).

precision.header_content: The precision of the asset specifies the quantity of supported decimal places. This value cannot be changed after asset creation.

extensions.header_content: The extensions are additional advanced settings that can be used to further customize the asset.

reward_percent.enabledInfo: A percentage cut of the market fee will be allocated to the referrer of active market participants.
reward_percent.disabled: Enable the referrer reward percentage extension?
reward_percent.disabledInfo: The referrer reward percentage extension allows the asset creator to allocate a percentage of the market fee to the referrer of active market participants.
reward_percent.header_content: The referrer reward percentage is the percentage of the market fee which is allocated to the referrer of active market participants.

whitelist_market_fee_sharing.enabled: Whitelist market fee sharing extension enabled
whitelist_market_fee_sharing.enabledInfo: The following referrer accounts will be approved to receive a cut of the collected market fees from their referrer accounts.
whitelist_market_fee_sharing.disabled: Enable the whitelist market fee sharing extension?
whitelist_market_fee_sharing.disabledInfo: You can limit who is allowed to receive a cut of the collected market fees to a set of pre-approved referrer accounts.
whitelist_market_fee_sharing.header_content: The whitelist market fee sharing extension allows the house to limit referrers to these whitelisted accounts.

taker_fee_percent.enabledInfo: The 'taker' participant of the limit order will receive a percentage of the market fee.
taker_fee_percent.disabled: Enable the taker fee percentage extension?
taker_fee_percent.disabledInfo: The taker fee percentage extension allows the asset creator to allocate a percentage of the market fee to the 'taker' of limit order operations.
taker_fee_percent.header_content: The taker fee percentage is the percentage of the market fee which is allocated to the 'taker' of the limit orders on the decentralized exchange.

allowed_markets.enabledInfo: The following markets are approved to trade this asset.
allowed_markets.disabledInfo: You can limit the markets that are allowed to trade this asset to a set of pre-approved markets.

banned_markets.enabledInfo: The following markets are banned from trading this asset.
banned_markets.disabledInfo: This feature enables you to ban specific market trading pairs, enabling you to help avoid your asset trading on undesired markets.

skipCER.enabledInfo: The asset creator has enabled the ability to skip the core exchange rate check for this asset.
skipCER.disabled: Skip the Core Exchange Rate calculation?
skipCER.disabledInfo: The Skip Core Exchange Rate extension allows the asset creator to skip the core exchange rate check for this asset.

whitelist.header_content: The asset whitelist authorities are accounts who can contribute their account's whistelisted accounts list to authorize interaction with this access.

blacklist.header_content: The asset blacklist authorities are accounts who can contribute their account's blacklisted accounts list to enforce a banned account list preventing interaction with this access.

market_fee.header_content: The market fee is the fee percentage that is charged on every trade that is executed on the Bitshares DEX. The fee is charged in the asset that is being traded.

max_market_fee.header_content: The maximum market fee is the maximum amount of the asset that can be charged as a fee on every trade that is executed on the Bitshares DEX.

quote_asset_amount.header_content: The amount of the your user issued asset that is required to purchase the base asset amount.

base_asset_amount.header_content: The amount of the base asset ({{symbol}}) that is required to purchase the quote asset amount.

calculated_cer_price.header_content: Make sure your core exchange rate is higher than the market price, otherwise people will buy your token from the market and drain your fee pool via implicit arbitrage. The core exchange rate should be updated regularly to reflect market pricing of your asset.

nft.NFTTitleContent: This is the title of your non-fungible token, make sure it's unique and descriptive as it may be presented within various non-fungible token galleries/explorers.
nft.NFTArtistContent: Name or pseudonym of the artist. May also include aliases or online names or handles, to include blockchain account names or addresses which might facilitate authenticating a signing key.
nft.NFTNarrativeContent: A personal statement from the artist describing the work, such as what the work means to them, or what inspired it. May include details of its creation, etc. It's a freeform field, and can be adapted as appropriate for the piece. Example, if the work is an avatar, playing card, role playing character, etc., then this field may also include stats and abilities, strengths, weaknesses, etc.
nft.NFTTagsContent: Comma-separated list of keywords to facilitate topic/interest searches.
nft.NFTTypeContent: A string which describes the type of non-fungible token, such as 'NFT/ART/VISUAL', 'NFT/ART/3D', 'NFT/ART/ANIMATION', 'NFT/ART/AUDIO', 'NFT/ART/VIDEO', 'NFT/ART/TEXT', 'NFT/ART/DOCUMENT', 'NFT/ART/OTHER', etc.
nft.NFTAttestationContent: Here the artist or originator of the encapsulated material commits or dedicates the material to the blockchain, expressly naming the token or asset ID under which the work will live, and attests to its qualified or unqualified uniqueness. E.g., an artist may attest that no other non-fungible token encapsulation of this work exists, and may declare intent as to future re-issues, or tokenization on other chains, etc.
nft.NFTAcknowledgementsContent: Acknowledgments or additional credits for the digital token.
nft.NFTHolderLicenseContent: If the token grants additional license for the use of the creative work specifically to token holders, this can be specified here. An example of such a license might be granting to the holder of the non-fungible token token the right to print and sell physical copies of the tokenized artwork, or to collect royalties for commercial use of the artwork, etc.
nft.NFTLicenseContent: License under which the artwork is released. Often, this will be a simple license identifier, such as 'CC BY-NC-SA 2.0', though it can also be a fully specified verbose license.
nft.modifyingMultimediaContents: Modifying this non-fungible token's multimedia contents
nft.referencesIPFSObjects: This non-fungible token currently references {{count}} IPFS objects, feel free to add/remove more.
nft.noIPFSGateway: Don't include an IPFS gateway host in non-fungible token media URLs, as 3rd parties will use their own gateways to access the content.
nft.ipfsHostingDescription: Check out the following example IPFS hosting/pinning services! By uploading to IPFS you save yourself considerably on fees!
nft.header_content: These are the details of your non-fungible token, make sure they're unique and descriptive as they may be presented within various NFT galleries/explorers.
nft.currentIPFSFiles: This non-fungible token currently contains {{count}} IPFS media file references.
nft.supportedFiletypes: Supported filetypes include images, video, audio, 3D files, documents, etc.
nft.main_header_content: The settings below define how your non-fungible token will behave on the Bitshares blockchain. The asset creator is responsible for properly configuring their non-fungible token.
